item.title: 三星电子高管表示，内存芯片需求今年将保持强劲，并将持续至2027年。
item.description: 三星电子周三表示，预计今年内存芯片需求将持续强劲，并延续至明年，公司高管指出，人工智能驱动的需求强劲是主要原因。【原文：Samsung Electronics expects strong demand for memory chips to continue this year and extend into next, a company executive said on Wednesday, citing robust demand driven by artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空管理局称，加拿大预计将宣布对湾流喷气机的认证
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局局长周二表示，他预计加拿大将宣布为部分延迟多年的湾流公务机颁发认证，从而解决特朗普总统曾重点提及的问题。【原文：The head of the U.S. Federal Aviation Administration said on Tuesday he expected Canada would announce it was certifying some Gulfstream business jets that had been delayed for years, resolving an issue highlighted by President Donald Trump.】

item.title: Cloudflare预测全年销售额将超预期，人工智能推动云服务需求增长
item.description: Cloudflare周二预测全年及第一季度销售额将超出华尔街预期，押注人工智能技术的快速发展将推动其云服务需求。【原文：Cloudflare forecast annual and first-quarter sales above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, betting on the rapid development of artificial intelligence technology to drive demand for its cloud services.】

item.title: 保险商Assurant利润因住房业务强劲及灾难减少而上升
item.description: 保险公司Assurant周二报告称，受其住房业务部门表现强劲以及灾难损失减少的推动，第四季度利润实现增长。【原文：Insurer Assurant reported a rise fourth-quarter profit on Tuesday, driven by strength in its housing unit and lower catastrophes.】

item.title: 美国食品药品监督管理局拒绝审评莫德纳公司流感疫苗申请
item.description: 美国食品药品监督管理局表示不会审核莫德纳公司流感疫苗的审批申请，该公司周二宣布这一消息后，其股价在盘后交易中下跌8%。【原文：The U.S. Food and Drug Administration will not review Moderna's approval application for its influenza vaccine, the company said on Tuesday, sending its shares down 8% in extended trading.】

item.title: 德国格瑞希迈公司启动Centor出售程序，因调查重新安排2025年业绩发布
item.description: 医疗设备制造商Gerresheimer周二宣布，因公司收入确认及会计实务正接受调查，其2025年业绩发布日期已重新安排，同时启动了旗下美国包装系统业务Centor的出售程序。【原文：Gerresheimer rescheduled its 2025 results publication due to a probe into its revenue recognition and accounting practices and also initiated the sale of its U.S.-based packaging systems business, Centor, the medical equipment maker said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚必胜客任命麦当劳高管安德鲁·格雷戈里为新任首席执行官
item.description: 澳大利亚特许经营商必胜客企业公司周三宣布，任命麦当劳高级管理人员安德鲁·格雷戈里为新任首席执行官兼董事总经理。【原文：Australian franchise operator Domino's Pizza Enterprises on Wednesday named Andrew Gregory, a senior McDonald's executive, as its new chief executive officer and managing director.】

item.title: 当地监管机构驳回宾夕法尼亚州数据中心开发项目的重新划区申请
item.description: 宾夕法尼亚州一个县委员会周二否决了泰伦能源公司提出的数百英亩土地重新划区的申请，该申请旨在开发数据中心。这标志着地方阻力阻碍美国服务器仓库扩张的最新案例。【原文：A county commission in Pennsylvania on Tuesday denied a request by Talen Energy to rezone hundreds of acres of land for the development of data centers, marking the latest example of local pushback hampering the U.S. expansion of server warehouses.】

item.title: 美国财政部称已向委内瑞拉颁发石油天然气勘探生产许可证
item.description: 美国财政部周二发布了一项通用许可证，授权向委内瑞拉提供用于石油和天然气勘探、开发或生产的美国商品、技术、软件或服务。这项期待已久的许可有望帮助该国提高产量。【原文：The U.S. Treasury Department on Tuesday issued a general license authorizing the provision of U.S. goods, technology, software or services for the exploration, development or production of oil and gas in Venezuela, a long-awaited permit that could help increase output in the country.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司第四季度石油和天然气产量同比增长18%
item.description: 巴西国有石油公司巴西石油公司周二报告称，2025年第四季度其石油、天然气及天然气液体的总产量达到每日311万桶油当量（boed），较上年同期增长约18%。【原文：Brazilian state-run oil firm Petrobras on Tuesday reported a total oil, gas and gas liquids production of 3.11 million barrels of oil equivalent per day (boed) in the fourth quarter of 2025, up about 18% from a year earlier.】

item.title: 两位由埃利奥特任命的董事将辞去西南航空董事会职务
item.description: 西南航空公司周二表示，代表激进投资者埃利奥特投资管理公司的两名董事将辞去董事会职务，辞职将于2月23日生效。【原文：Southwest Airlines said on Tuesday two directors representing activist investor Elliott Investment Management are stepping down from the board, effective February 23.】

item.title: 墨西哥美洲移动公司第四季度利润激增四倍
item.description: 墨西哥电信巨头美洲移动周二公布，2025年第四季度利润飙升逾300%，得益于融资成本较上年同期有所降低。【原文：Mexican telecoms giant America Movil on Tuesday posted a more than 300% jump in profit for the fourth quarter of 2025, helped by lower financing costs than the year before.】

item.title: 澳大利亚AGL能源公司下调全年盈利预期，上半年利润下降6%
item.description: 澳大利亚电力生产商AGL能源周三下调全年盈利预期，称消费者利润率上升且成本下降，同时报告上半年基本利润下降6.4%。【原文：Australian power producer AGL Energy narrowed its full-year earnings forecast on Wednesday, citing higher consumer margin and lower costs, while reporting a 6.4% fall in its first-half underlying profit.】

item.title: 美国国际集团季度利润因承保业务增强、灾难损失费用降低而上升
item.description: 美国国际集团周二公布第四季度经调整利润上升，得益于承保业务强劲增长及投资回报率提升。【原文：American International Group reported a rise in fourth-quarter adjusted profit on Tuesday, as the insurer was helped by strong gains from underwriting and better returns on its investments.】

item.title: 消息人士称，黑石集团增持人工智能初创公司Anthropic的股份，投资额增至约10亿美元。
item.description: 知情人士周二向路透社透露，黑石集团正加大对克劳德聊天机器人制造商Anthropic的投资力度，将其持股比例提升至约10亿美元，公司估值约为3500亿美元。【原文：Blackstone is increasing its investment in the Claude chatbot maker Anthropic, raising its stake to about $1 billion at a valuation of roughly $350 billion, a person familiar with the matter told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: Freshworks预测年度营收将超预期，得益于强劲的AI驱动型软件需求
item.description: Freshworks周二公布的年度营收预测值高于华尔街预期，该公司押注其融合人工智能的软件工具将获得更广泛应用，这些工具可实现客户支持和IT服务的自动化。【原文：Freshworks forecast annual revenue above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, betting on growing adoption of its software tools that incorporate artificial intelligence to automate customer support and IT services.】

item.title: 芭比制造商美泰公司预测年度利润低于预期，因消费者支出趋于谨慎
item.description: 美泰公司周二预测全年利润将低于华尔街预期，此前该公司第四季度业绩未达预期，因可自由支配支出疲软拖累了玩具需求。【原文：Mattel on Tuesday forecast full-year profit below Wall Street expectations after missing fourth-quarter estimates, as weak discretionary spending weighed on toy demand.】

item.title: Robinhood报告季度营收创纪录，得益于散户交易的强劲表现
item.description: 罗宾汉金融周二公布创纪录的第四季度营收，这家零售经纪商正借势个人交易者在股票市场日益增长的影响力。【原文：Robinhood Markets reported record fourth-quarter revenue on Tuesday, as the retail brokerage taps into the growing role of individual traders in the equities markets.】

item.title: Lyft季度业绩受风暴影响，10亿美元回购计划蒙上阴影；股价下跌
item.description: Lyft周二公布的季度预订量和调整后核心利润低于预期，受美国部分地区严冬风暴影响，其新推出的10亿美元股票回购计划黯然失色，盘后交易中股价下跌13%。【原文：Lyft forecast first-quarter bookings and adjusted core profit below expectations on Tuesday, hit by severe winter storms in parts of the U.S., overshadowing a new $1 billion share repurchase program and sending shares 13% lower in after-hours trading.】

item.title: 福特季度盈利未达预期，首席执行官预计2026年业绩将更强劲
item.description: 福特汽车季度核心利润下滑约50%至10亿美元，原因是该公司因铝供应商火灾承受了超出预期的成本。但首席执行官吉姆·法利预测，随着这家汽车制造商削减成本并致力于生产具有全球竞争力的车型，今年将实现强劲业绩。【原文：Ford Motor's quarterly core profit fell about 50% to $1 billion as it absorbed higher-than-expected costs from a fire at an aluminum supplier, but CEO Jim Farley predicted strong performance this year as the automaker slashes costs and works to produce globally competitive models.】

item.title: 吉利德季度业绩超出华尔街预期
item.description: 吉利德科学公司周二公布的第四季度销售额和利润略高于华尔街预期，但其2026年财务预测处于分析师预期的较低区间。【原文：Gilead Sciences on Tuesday reported fourth-quarter sales and profit that came in slightly above Wall Street estimates, while its 2026 financial forecast was at the lower end of analysts' expectations.】

item.title: 凯撒医疗集团就心理健康护理实践问题与美国劳工部达成3000万美元和解协议
item.description: 美国劳工部周二表示，已与凯撒基金会健康计划达成和解，以解决针对该公司心理健康和药物滥用障碍服务做法的多项调查。【原文：The U.S. Department of Labor said on Tuesday it has settled with Kaiser Foundation Health Plan to resolve multiple investigations into the company's practices on mental health and substance use disorder services.】

item.title: 中国加强市场监管以创造"缓牛"行情
item.description: 随着全球资本逐步回流中国，政策制定者正释放信号：他们希望实现没有泡沫的增长。通过加强执法力度和采取降温措施来放缓市场增速，从而增强其长期吸引力。【原文：As global capital trickles back toward China, policymakers are signalling they want growth without the froth, using tougher enforcement and cooling measures to slow the market's pace in order to strengthen its appeal in the long term.】

item.title: 澳大利亚联邦银行上半年现金盈利创纪录，得益于贷款业务增长
item.description: 澳大利亚联邦银行周三公布上半年现金盈利创纪录，得益于贷款和存款规模的强劲增长，但低利率环境下的激烈竞争导致利润率承压。【原文：Commonwealth Bank of Australia reported a record first-half cash earnings on Wednesday, propped up by robust growth in lending and deposit volumes, although margins were pressured due to tight competition in a low-interest-rate environment.】

item.title: 萨克斯全球将在破产程序中再关闭九家门店
item.description: 萨克斯全球公司周二宣布将再关闭九家门店，这家高端百货集团正致力于聚焦盈利能力更强的门店。【原文：Saks Global said on Tuesday it is closing nine more stores as the high-end department store conglomerate looks to focus on more profitable locations.】

item.title: 彭博社报道称，随着电动汽车业务亏损加剧，Stellantis正寻求退出与三星的电池合资企业。
item.description: 据彭博社周二报道，知情人士透露，随着这家汽车制造商缩减其电动汽车计划，Stellantis NV正寻求退出与韩国三星SDI公司的美国电池合资企业。【原文：Stellantis NV is looking to exit its U.S. battery joint venture with South Korea's Samsung SDI Co. as the automaker scales back its electric-vehicle ambitions, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 巴西Agibank大幅缩减美国IPO规模逾50%，下调发行价区间
item.description: 巴西金融科技公司Agibank周二在监管文件中披露，已将其在美国首次公开募股（IPO）的规模缩减逾50%，并大幅下调了拟定价格区间。【原文：Brazilian fintech Agibank has downsized its U.S. initial public offering by more than 50% and slashed the proposed price range, according to a regulatory filing on Tuesday.】

item.title: 波音计划于盛夏时节开通第四条737生产线
item.description: 波音公司一位高管周二在航空航天供应商大会上表示，波音计划于今夏中旬在华盛顿州埃弗雷特市开通第四条737 MAX生产线。【原文：Boeing plans to open fourth 737 MAX production line in Everett, Washington, in mid-summer, a Boeing executive said Tuesday at an aerospace suppliers' conference.】

item.title: 美国调查未发现中国电源逆变器存在间谍软件
item.description: 据路透社看到的美国能源部报告显示，美国能源官员未发现中国制造的逆变器中存在恶意通信设备的证据，这些逆变器被用于该国的电力基础设施。【原文：U.S. energy officials found no evidence of malicious communication equipment embedded in Chinese-made inverters in the nation's power infrastructure, according to a Department of Energy report viewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 白宫称特朗普计划撤销气候变化认定，该认定是汽车法规的关键依据
item.description: 白宫周二表示，美国总统唐纳德·特朗普计划于周四正式启动一项举措，旨在推翻奥巴马时期为联邦温室气体法规所奠定的法律基础，此举将导致汽车排放法规被废除。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump plans to formalize on Thursday a move to overturn the Obama-era legal basis for federal greenhouse gas rules, which will lead to the repeal of vehicle emissions rules, the White House said on Tuesday.】
